name: Bubble Bunny: Animal Forest
description:
💛🧡❤️️💚💙💜

WELCOME TO THE MOST RELAXING COLOR-MATCHING ADVENTURE!
Bubble Bunny: Animal Forest is a colorful, fun & highly addictive bubble shooter game that’ll keep you playing for hours!
If you want a game that’s fun, cute, and relaxing, look no further! Challenging without being frustrating, this bubble shooter game is great to pass the time!
💛🧡❤️️💚💙💜

Fire your bubble shooter to save the cute baby bunnies out of trouble! Aim, match and smash the bubbles to help them collect carrots. Each bubble you pop will bring a bunny closer to their happily ever after!

Unique levels will require a variety of strategies and tactics to pop all the bubbles and save the bunnies. Match the bubbles and aim carefully before you shoot so you don’t run out of bubbles. Your efforts will be rewarded with coins and special items, so hop to it and bubble shoot your way to victory!

Try Bubble Bunny: Animal Forest - the best free bubble pop game today!

HOW TO PLAY
🐰 Aim carefully and tap where you want your bubble shooter to go!
🐰 Match 3 or more same-colored bubbles to make them pop!
🐰 Special boosters & items to help you pass trickier levels.
🐰 Pop all the bubbles with minimal shots to score higher.

FEATURES
🐰 TONS OF UNIQUE & EXCITING LEVELS!
🐰 EASY AND FUN PLAY! Simple to learn and fun to master!
🐰 EXCITING EVENTS! Earn daily rewards to help you out!
🐰 CONNECT TO FACEBOOK! Share the popping fun with your friends!
🐰 NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Play offline!
🐰 STUNNING GRAPHICS! Soothing soundtrack and gorgeous visual effects

NOTES
• Bubble Bunny: Animal Forest contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Bubble Bunny: Animal Forest is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like AD FREE and coins.
• Bubble Bunny: Animal Forest is available on smartphone or tablet.

PRIVACY POLICY
http://www.nova520-cn.com/static/privacy.html

EMAIL

Help Bunny recover the baby bunnies with your bubble shooter!
